comment: Projection Theorem: Any Hilbert space vector ` A ` can be decomposed into a member ` x ` of a closed subspace ` H ` and a member ` y ` of the complement of the subspace. Theorem 3.7(i) of [Beran] p. 102 (existence part). (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
